body:
I see people everyday that ask where someone went, or why isn't this person ever one, so I thought that I'd make a topic for it.

I'm calling it "The Avicus Memorial". It's a topic where I'll list all the known players that have left, and why they left (if we know).

Just post the IGN of a player that was here and is no longer, and if you can, why they left. Thank you.

(Former staff members will be italicised)

Goodbye to these wonderful Avicadians.


-FightToWin7431 - Aviation College (?)
-Howsie22 - Temporarily gone due to personal reasons.
-Storm997 - Inactivity
-awesome_apricot
-yoavkipper - Limited access to a computer
-pizza334 -Back from the dead <3
-aagrant99
-killerbye22
-gaboelmejor
-Ambamore2000 - Banned
-BlueberryWaffle7
-xLininger
-lukehan2001 - Boarding School
-Voltdrive
-Corkscrew102 - Hacked.
-DebateCards - Quit Avicus.
-ObsidianFire99
-Celestrian572
-Hunting_chick
-Gamerz_finest
-aTerrorism
-G_SKIPPY
-BOSS_Turtle98
-vlushy11
-cedd2701
-usmoothie
-Hughsie1
-sfkwww
-Ingigo
-roboticboy16
-NesaFairy
-KizzyFizzy
-mrmarksman55
-roqqan
-FreeSoul_
-JUBBINATOR
